((Come do you think I would let it end like that.))

As the smoke clears the fire damage is every where.

Dark looks at the fire "that was almost a waste of my time"

As a shadow starts walking towards him "The Fight is not yet over you for get 
why I am the White Lion of Hope."

Dark Looks at the figure "Can it be no." 

Lio walks out of the smoke as seems to cling to him slow rolling off. He 
Thrust his sword into the ground as it seems to fade back into a thin line 
and then nothing As Cracks shoot up his armor and it shatters like a shell to 
reveal Flashing Convoy.

Dark"Your other mode I know its secret you don't have the energy flux divide 
so it only will last 12 minutes hot rod stopped the experiment before it was 
installed."
